price: 21. (Allah) alobi: Zua yango, kaši kobanga te, tokozongisa yango na lolenge ezalaki liboso.
arabic: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla khudh'hā walā takhaf sanuʿīduhā sīratahā al-ūlā
